title: Illuminated Porsche Sign at No Reserve
description: This Porsche sign is made up of seven individually illuminated letters that collectively span 13' and spell out the company name, and each letter measures about 22″ wide, 12″ tall, and 3″ deep. The lettering is in the Porsche script style and features translucent red face panels, metal enclosures, internal LED fixtures, 120-volt wiring, and threaded mounting holes. Acquired by the seller in 2010, this Porsche sign assembly is now offered at no reserve in Grandview, Missouri.
author: bringatrailer
excerpt: Bid for the chance to own a No Reserve: Illuminated Porsche Sign at auction with Bring a Trailer, the home of the best vintage and classic cars online. Lot #178,960.
text: This Porsche sign is made up of seven individually illuminated letters that collectively span 13′ and spell out the company name, and each letter measures about 22″ wide, 12″ tall, and 3″ deep. The lettering is in the Porsche script style and features translucent red face panels, metal enclosures, internal LED fixtures, 120-volt wiring, and threaded mounting holes. Acquired by the seller in 2010, this Porsche sign assembly is now offered at no reserve in Grandview, Missouri. The sign consists of seven letters that span about 13′ and spell out the company name. Each letter is constructed of a metal frame with a translucent red panel measuring approximately 22″ wide, 12″ tall, and 3″ deep. The seller notes marks and imperfections on the backside of the letters. Illumination is provided by LED lights housed within the enclosure. Each letter has threaded standoff mounts and 120-volt wiring exiting through the back. Porsche markings are present on the case of the “P”. You are not connected to real-time updates. html:
This Porsche sign is made up of seven individually illuminated letters that collectively span 13′ and spell out the company name, and each letter measures about 22″ wide, 12″ tall, and 3″ deep. The lettering is in the Porsche script style and features translucent red face panels, metal enclosures, internal LED fixtures, 120-volt wiring, and threaded mounting holes. Acquired by the seller in 2010, this Porsche sign assembly is now offered at no reserve in Grandview, Missouri.

The sign consists of seven letters that span about 13′ and spell out the company name. Each letter is constructed of a metal frame with a translucent red panel measuring approximately 22″ wide, 12″ tall, and 3″ deep. The seller notes marks and imperfections on the backside of the letters.

Illumination is provided by LED lights housed within the enclosure.

Each letter has threaded standoff mounts and 120-volt wiring exiting through the back.

Porsche markings are present on the case of the “P”.
